content: adding bobbles dc5tog single_crochet on row 6 whenever the yarn color changes to the cc as you please according to pattern notes continue to add bobbles or regular double_crochet througout pattern as yarn color changes from mc to cc row 21 chain-1 2dc in 1st st double_crochet 10 12 sts row 22-26 chain-1 dc12 sts row 27 chain-1 2dc in 1st st double_crochet 11 13 sts row 28-32 chain-1 double_crochet 13 sts row 33 chain-1 2dc in 1st st double_crochet 12 14 sts row 34-42 ch1 double_crochet 14 sts row 43 chain-1 2dc in 1st st double_crochet 13 15 sts row 44-52 ch1 double_crochet 15 sts row 53 chain-1 2dc in 1st st double_crochet 14 16 sts row 54-98 ch1 double_crochet 16 sts row 99 chain-1 dc1 in 2nd st double_crochet 14 15 sts row 100-108 ch1 double_crochet 15 sts row 109 chain-1 dc1 in 2nd st double_crochet 13 14 sts row 110-118 ch1 double_crochet 14 row 119 chain-1 dc1 in 2nd st double_crochet 12 13 sts row 120-124 chain-1 double_crochet 13 row 125 chain-1 dc1 in 2nd st double_crochet 11 12 sts row 126-130 chain-1 double_crochet 12 row 131-149 repeat row 125 and 125 decreasing one stitch on every odd numbered row row 150 chain-1 double_crochet 2 draw loop through end weave in ends and wet block to open up stitches garden trellis by wendee shulsen www hazelknits com - wendee@hazelknits com page 3 chain 4 beginning chain at the beginning of the cc light green so the foundation set-up is increase/decrease row are worked entirely with the cc highlighted row 1 double_crochet in 3rd and 4th chain 2 sts bind-off row 2 chain-1 double_crochet in 1st and 2nd chain spaces 2 sts 2 sts row 3 chain-1 2dc in 1st st double_crochet in next st 3 sts row 149 chain-1 dc1 in 2nd st double_crochet 1 1 sts row 4 chain-1 double_crochet 3 3 sts row 148 3 sts row 5 chain-1 2dc in 1st st double_crochet 2 4 sts row 147 chain-1 dc1 in 2nd st double_crochet 2 3 sts row 6 4 sts row 146 4 sts row 7 chain-1 2dc in 1st st double_crochet 3 5 sts row 145 chain-1 dc1 in 2nd st double_crochet 3 4 sts row 8 5 sts row 144 5 sts row 9 chain-1 2dc in 1st st double_crochet 4 6 sts row 143 chain-1 dc1 in 2nd st double_crochet 4 5 sts row 10 6 sts begin adding bobbles in as yarn indicates row 142 6 sts row 11 chain-1 2dc in 1st st double_crochet 5 7 sts row 141 chain-1 dc1 in 2nd st double_crochet 5 6 sts row 12 7 sts row 140 7 sts row 13 chain-1 2dc in 1st st double_crochet 6 8 sts row 139 chain-1 dc1 in 2nd st double_crochet 6 7 sts row 14 8 sts row 138 8 sts row 15 chain-1 2dc in 1st st double_crochet 7 9 sts row 137 chain-1 dc1 in 2nd st double_crochet 7 8 sts
